mapper.select: SELECT CQ.CONSULTING_REQUEST_NUMBER, CQ.USER_NUMBER, CQ.COMPANY_NUMBER, CQ.CONSULTING_REQUEST_DATE, C.CONSULTING_COMMENT, CQ.CONSULTING_REQUEST_COMMENT, CF.FILE_NAME, CF.FILE_UPLOAD_PATH FROM TBL_CONSULTING_REQUEST CQ JOIN TBL_CONSULTING C ON CQ.CONSULTING_REQUEST_NUMBER = C.CONSULTING_REQUEST_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_COMPANY_FILE CF ON CQ.COMPANY_NUMBER = CF.COMPANY_NUMBER WHERE C.CONSULTING_REQUEST_NUMBER = #{consultingRequestNumber}

SELECT SEQ_CONSULTING_REVIEW.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_CONSULTING_REVIEW (REVIEW_NUMBER, CONSULTING_REQUEST_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, COMPANY_NUMBER, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_GRADE) VALUES (#{reviewNumber}, #{consultingRequestNumber}, #{userNumber}, #{companyNumber}, SYSDATE, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewGrade})
mapper.select: SELECT CQ.CONSULTING_REQUEST_NUMBER, CQ.USER_NUMBER, CQ.COMPANY_NUMBER, CR.REVIEW_NUMBER, CQ.CONSULTING_REQUEST_DATE ,C.CONSULTING_COMMENT,CQ.CONSULTING_REQUEST_COMMENT, CF.FILE_NAME, CF.FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, CR.REVIEW_DATE, CR.REVIEW_CONTENT,CR.REVIEW_GRADE FROM TBL_CONSULTING_REQUEST CQ JOIN TBL_CONSULTING C ON CQ.CONSULTING_REQUEST_NUMBER = C.CONSULTING_REQUEST_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_COMPANY_FILE CF ON CQ.COMPANY_NUMBER = CF.COMPANY_NUMBER JOIN TBL_CONSULTING_REVIEW CR ON CQ.CONSULTING_REQUEST_NUMBER = CR.CONSULTING_REQUEST_NUMBER WHERE CR.REVIEW_NUMBER = #{reviewNumber}

select O.USER_NUMBER, O.ORDER_NUMBER, P.PRODUCT_NUMBER,P.PRODUCT_NAME, O.ORDER_DATE, F.FILE_NAME, F.FILE_UPLOAD_PATH FROM TBL_ORDER O JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON O.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER LEFT JOIN (SELECT FILE_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, PRODUCT_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT FILE_NAME,FILE_UPLOAD_PATH,PRODUCT_NUMBER, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY PRODUCT_NUMBER ORDER BY FILE_NUMBER) RK FROM TBL_PRODUCT_FILE ) WHERE RK = 1 ) F ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = F.PRODUCT_NUMBER WHERE ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber}

mapper.select: select O.ORDER_NUMBER, O.USER_NUMBER, O.PRODUCT_NUMBER, ORV.REVIEW_NUMBER , O.ORDER_DATE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, ORV.REVIEW_DATE, ORV.REVIEW_CONTENT, ORV.REVIEW_GRADE, F.FILE_NAME, F.FILE_UPLOAD_PATH from TBL_ORDER_REVIEW ORV JOIN TBL_ORDER O ON ORV.ORDER_NUMBER = O.ORDER_NUMBER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON O.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER LEFT JOIN (SELECT FILE_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, PRODUCT_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT FILE_NAME,FILE_UPLOAD_PATH,PRODUCT_NUMBER, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY PRODUCT_NUMBER ORDER BY FILE_NUMBER) RK FROM TBL_PRODUCT_FILE ) WHERE RK = 1 ) F ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = F.PRODUCT_NUMBER WHERE O.USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC

select O.ORDER_NUMBER, O.USER_NUMBER, O.PRODUCT_NUMBER, ORV.REVIEW_NUMBER , O.ORDER_DATE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, ORV.REVIEW_DATE, ORV.REVIEW_CONTENT, ORV.REVIEW_GRADE, F.FILE_NAME, F.FILE_UPLOAD_PATH from TBL_ORDER_REVIEW ORV JOIN TBL_ORDER O ON ORV.ORDER_NUMBER = O.ORDER_NUMBER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON O.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER LEFT JOIN (SELECT FILE_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, PRODUCT_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT FILE_NAME,FILE_UPLOAD_PATH,PRODUCT_NUMBER, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY PRODUCT_NUMBER ORDER BY FILE_NUMBER) RK FROM TBL_PRODUCT_FILE ) WHERE RK = 1 ) F ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = F.PRODUCT_NUMBER WHERE REVIEW_NUMBER = #{reviewNumber}
